row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@UNIX
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_VPC_OPTION# = '' :IF &UC4RB_AWS_VPC_ID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_VPC_OPTION# = '-c &UC4RB_AWS_VPC_ID#' :ENDIF
echo "Creating security group \"&UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_GRP#\".."
output=$(java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute "$EC2_HOME"/bin/ec2-create-group &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# "&UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_GRP#" -d "&UC4RB_AWS_DESCRIPTION#" &UC4RB_VPC_OPTION#) RC=$?
echo "$output" if [ "$RC" -gt 0 ]; then echo Unsuccessfully create group exit $RC fi
echo "Successfully create security group \"&UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_GRP#\""
output_line=$(printf "%s\n" "$output" | grep ^GROUP) output_array=($output_line) group_id=${output_array[1]}
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_VPC_ID# <> "" : IF &UC4RB_AWS_ALLOW_ALL_OUT# = "NO" echo Revoking default outbound rule from group.. java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute "$EC2_HOME"/bin/ec2-revoke &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# $group_id --egress -P all RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt 0 ]; then echo Unsuccessfully revoke default outbound rule exit $RC fi echo Successfully revoke default outbound rule : ENDIF :ENDIF
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "GROUP*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 6, 1) : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 7) : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ") : DEFINE &results#, string, 3 : FILL &results#[] = STR_SPLIT(&output_line#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_OUT_SECURITY_GRP# = &results#[1] : PRINT Group ID = &UC4RB_OUT_SECURITY_GRP# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_SECURITY_GRP#, , "WORKFLOW" : TERM_PROCESS :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
